trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ramona
There were no other sightings in Ramona on or around May 21st 2002
Summary: Saw a fast moving bright light
divs: Sighting Details I was running to the corner store and happen tonotice above me out the windshield a very bright fast moving light. My reactionwas literally What the heck is that?!? This light was the brightness of a closeaircraft landing light but was moving away to the SW at rapid speed. No soundwas appearant and through binoculars I could only see the bright white light noother lights were visible. The most likely explanation would be a meteor thathad no tail or trail as it followed a single course until hidden by thetreeline.
